availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard A. Spalding (Marion Co., retired merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, retired merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Spalding. Father of Martin Spalding, Mary P. Spalding, William R. Spalding, and Elizabeth Spalding. Former merchant in Marion County in 1850. Retired merchant in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District no. 1, p. 342. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, 546. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, 74. Find A Grave, "Leonard Augustine Spalding (c1807-c1888)," Memorial #103686081, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/103686081 (accessed December 22, 2018).
